amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to reduce Migration and Refugee Assistance funding by $500 million and increase International Narcotics Control and Law Enforcement funding by $500 million.
amendment.purpose: Amendment reduces Migration and Refugee Assistance funding by $500 million and increases International Narcotics Control and Law Enforcement funding by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mace amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 199 (Roll no. 312).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mace amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 199 (Roll no. 312).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mace amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 199 (Roll no. 312).
